title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: June 28, 2022, 07:33:33 PMLast edit: June 30, 2022, 09:08:30 PM by ZipReg
content: Hey guys!  Up for auction today is a truly one of a kind display piece.Presenting...Bitcoin Rocket Guy! III Limited Edition #001 of 001The Bitcoin Rocket Guy is comprised of separate 3d printer projects,which I have then hand cut, drilled, and assembled together.I then took pictures, and selected one to incorporate into a certificate of authenticity design for the piece,which (as with all of my created certificates) was then printed onto five factor security paper.The rocket is not permanently affixed to the stand, so you can adjust bitcoin rocket guys pose, if desired. I've had a lot of fun on this project, and I hope it's brought a smile to your face as well. Thanks!Auction terms:Starting bid: 0.005BTCMin bid increments: 0.0001BTCAuction ends: Thursday, June 30th @ 6:00PM EST. Countdown Timer Sniping: Nope, any bids made in the final 5 minutes of the auction willextend the auction for another 5 minutes until no new bids are made.Shipping: Based on winners location/preference.Payment address for this auction: I will PM the winner.*I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit for any bidders at my sole discretion.Thank You & Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on June 30, 2022, 04:43:00 PM0.005BTCCurrent high bid!Thank you, Sir! Less than 1 Hr. remaining!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on June 30, 2022, 04:43:00 PM0.005BTCWinner! Congrats! I will reach out shortly, thanks!
